info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 16 at 9:08AM MDT until October 16 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Grant County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 1000 AM MDT. * At 908 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buckhorn, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Cliff, Buckhorn, Gila Hot Springs, Riverside, Gila, Copperas Vista, Mogollon Box Campground and Portions of the Gila Wilderness. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
